pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 奇数と偶数は交互に現れる。
lessons.english: Odd numbers alternate with even ones.

lessons.japanese: 我々は、交互に休息をとった。
lessons.english: We took a rest one after the other.

lessons.japanese: 雨と雪が交互に降った一週間だった。
lessons.english: It was a week of alternating snow and rain.

lessons.japanese: チェッカー盤の黒と白の枡は交互に並んでいる。
lessons.english: The black and white squares on a checker board are arranged alternately.

lessons.japanese: 彼らは交互に車を運転した。
lessons.english: They drove the car one after the other.

lessons.japanese: 彼は左右交互に手を上げた。
lessons.english: He raised his hands one after the other.

lessons.japanese: 足を温かくするために足を交互に組み替えなければならなかった。
lessons.english: In order to keep our feet warm we had to shift from one foot to another and keep moving.

lessons.japanese: 私は交互に楽観主義になったり悲観主義になる。
lessons.english: I am by turns an optimist and a pessimist.

lessons.japanese: 私たちは２時間の労働と１０分の休憩を交互にとった。
lessons.english: We alternated two hours of work and ten minutes of rest.

lessons.japanese: 好況と不況は交互に来る。
好運と不幸は交互に起こる。
景気循環とは好況時と不況時が交互に繰り返し起こることである。
lessons.english: A business cycle is a recurring succession of periods of prosperity and periods of depression.

lessons.japanese: 奇数と偶数は交互に現れる。
lessons.english: Odd numbers alternate with even ones.

lessons.japanese: 我々は、交互に休息をとった。
lessons.english: We took a rest one after the other.
